languages.text: {n}Губы Джай кривятся в болезненной гримасе, но уже спустя мгновение на них вновь играет ослепительная улыбка.{/n} "Прошу меня простить, шерин. Я неправильно поняла... суть наших отношений. Это больше не повторится".

{n}Jae's lips twist into a pained grimace, but a moment later her dazzling smile is back in place.{/n} "Please forgive me, shereen. I misunderstood... the nature of our relationship. It won't happen again."
languages.original_text: {n}Губы Джай кривятся в болезненной гримасе, но уже спустя мгновение на них вновь играет ослепительная улыбка.{/n} "Прошу меня простить, шерин. Я неправильно поняла... суть наших отношений. Это больше не повторится".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae's lips twist into a pained grimace, but a moment later her dazzling smile is back in place.{/n} "Please forgive me, shereen. I misunderstood... the nature of our relationship. It won't happen again."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae's lips twist into a pained grimace, but a moment later her dazzling smile is back in place.{/n} "Please forgive me, shereen. I misunderstood... the nature of our relationship. It won't happen again."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊咬紧了嘴唇，露出了痛苦的表情。但片刻之后，她的脸上再次恢复了灿烂的笑容。{/n}“请原谅我，亲爱的。是我误会了……我们之间关系的本质，这种事情不会再发生了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's lips twist into a pained grimace, but a moment later her dazzling smile is back in place.{/n} "Please forgive me, shereen. I misunderstood... the nature of our relationship. It won't happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊咬紧了嘴唇，露出了痛苦的表情。但片刻之后，她的脸上再次恢复了灿烂的笑容。{/n}“请原谅我，亲爱的。是我误会了……我们之间关系的本质，这种事情不会再发生了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n} ジェイは唇を歪めて苦笑いを浮かべたが、しばらくすると眩しい笑顔が戻った。{/n}「許してよ、シャリーン。あたし、お互いの関係を誤解していたみたいね…もう二度としないよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's lips twist into a pained grimace, but a moment later her dazzling smile is back in place.{/n} "Please forgive me, shereen. I misunderstood... the nature of our relationship. It won't happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n} ジェイは唇を歪めて苦笑いを浮かべたが、しばらくすると眩しい笑顔が戻った。{/n}「許してよ、シャリーン。あたし、お互いの関係を誤解していたみたいね…もう二度としないよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los labios de Jae forman una mueca de dolor, pero su sonrisa vuelve al cabo de un momento.{/n} «Lo siento, shereen. Había... malinterpretado la naturaleza de nuestra relación. No volverá a suceder».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's lips twist into a pained grimace, but a moment later her dazzling smile is back in place.{/n} "Please forgive me, shereen. I misunderstood... the nature of our relationship. It won't happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los labios de Jae forman una mueca de dolor, pero su sonrisa vuelve al cabo de un momento.{/n} «Lo siento, shereen. Había... malinterpretado la naturaleza de nuestra relación. No volverá a suceder».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une grimace de douleur tord les lèvres de Jae, mais l'instant d'après, son sourire étincelant est de retour.{/n} « Je vous demande pardon, shereen. J'avais mal compris la... nature de notre relation. Ça ne se reproduira pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's lips twist into a pained grimace, but a moment later her dazzling smile is back in place.{/n} "Please forgive me, shereen. I misunderstood... the nature of our relationship. It won't happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une grimace de douleur tord les lèvres de Jae, mais l'instant d'après, son sourire étincelant est de retour.{/n} « Je vous demande pardon, shereen. J'avais mal compris la... nature de notre relation. Ça ne se reproduira pas. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jaes Lippen verziehen sich zu einer schmerzverzerrten Grimasse, aber einen Moment später lächelt sie wieder strahlend.{/n} "Vergebt mir bitte, Shereen. Ich habe die Art unserer Beziehung ... falsch eingeschätzt. Es wird nicht wieder vorkommen."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's lips twist into a pained grimace, but a moment later her dazzling smile is back in place.{/n} "Please forgive me, shereen. I misunderstood... the nature of our relationship. It won't happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jaes Lippen verziehen sich zu einer schmerzverzerrten Grimasse, aber einen Moment später lächelt sie wieder strahlend.{/n} "Vergebt mir bitte, Shereen. Ich habe die Art unserer Beziehung ... falsch eingeschätzt. Es wird nicht wieder vorkommen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın dudakları, acılı bir şekilde büzüşse de kısa süre içinde göz alıcı gülümsemesi geri geliyor.{/n} "Lütfen affet beni şirinim. Bu... İlişkimizin doğasını yanlış anlamışım. Bir daha olmayacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's lips twist into a pained grimace, but a moment later her dazzling smile is back in place.{/n} "Please forgive me, shereen. I misunderstood... the nature of our relationship. It won't happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın dudakları acılı bir şekilde büzüşüyor ancak kısa süre içinde göz alıcı gülümsemesi geri geliyor.{/n} "Lütfen affet beni şirinim. Bu... İlişkimizin doğasını yanlış anlamışım. Bir daha olmayacak."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
